snippet.title: Slippery Sid (1983 / 2020 re-crack) Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
Huge playlist archive with games from 1982-1992: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3uy0uOIHzPaxfOp53uJLX7-
Many more games from the 80s can be found here:
Racing games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3vkkE35mCw6x63QFBnU9Xsi
AY / GFX improved games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLxOanVBhqd3t74YnYAJA9p4vMQYZYCJWX
A classic game now in a new version with Andy Green's loading screen from 2020. It is a Beta Disk version made by Tiboh in 2020 and TRD and SCL files can be downloaded here: https://vtrd.in/release.php?r=f2b61962f6df3b3434bc4c022955e468

There are four levels in this game. You keep playing on level 4 but every time you complete it you will be longer and there will be more frogs to eat.

THE GAME:
Guide Sid the snake around the garden scoffing frogs. Frogs make Sid grow longer, which makes things more dangerous as you mustn't crash into anything - this includes your own body and the walls of the garden!  Every time you eat a frog, a new toad enters the garden. Toads are poisonous to Sid, so you must avoid these too. However, every now and then a magic mushroom will grow which, when eaten, will allow you to eat one toad without coming to any harm! Once the garden is cleared of frogs, it's on to the next area. Sid is provided with three lives with which to score as much as he can.
